name: Ellie Language
description: A type-safe programming language designed for embedded and sandboxed environments (WebAssembly, ARM) with focus on performance and safety.
longDescription: Ellie is a compiled programming language that I built from scratch, featuring a complete parser, compiler, and virtual machine. It's designed for embedded systems and WebAssembly targets with advanced memory management, stack/heap allocation, garbage collection, and bytecode optimization.

name: UtilStation
description: Your one-stop shop for all development tools - a comprehensive collection of utilities for various programming situations.
longDescription: UtilStation provides developers with a unified platform containing all the tools they need in one single app. From JSON formatters to regex testers, color pickers to code converters - everything a developer needs in their daily workflow.
